channel.title: How To make Commands For mods/admins, change yell
channel.description:
okay so i've search and searched, and cant find out how. I remember seeing it somewhere on here, but cant find it.
there are some commands i would like to fix. like ANYONE can do ::master and get 99 in all combat skills, i want to make this like for donators/admins, how would i do that?
also i want to know, how to make ::yell for only mod/admin's because ANYONE can do it. Sooo
if you could tell me what to change, and all that it would be appreciated

item.title: How To make Commands For mods/admins, change yell
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

How do i make it so donators/mods and admins are the only who can yell. Scrubby, all you did was bump.

pleaseeee help

Read full topic

item.title: How To make Commands For mods/admins, change yell
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

okay well i found it and it looks like this

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

how would i make it so donators/mods+ can do it, not new guys

Read full topic

thanks.

now for the rest of my question[/quote]search for ("yell
